meta.content: Elite Sports Academy Dubai offers multi sports coaching in dubai for kids. Swimming classes for Children in Dubai. Best football academy for kids in Dubai & Abu Dhabi.
Sports Academy Dubai & Abu Dhabi: Multi Sports Coaching | Elite Sports
Elite Sports Academy Dubai offers multi sports coaching in dubai for kids. Swimming classes for Children in Dubai. Best football academy for kids in Dubai & Abu Dhabi.

div.p: MULTIPLE LOCATIONS AVAILABLE
REGISTER NOW FOR YOUR FREE ASSESSMENT
LAUNCHING AT A VENUE NEAR YOU
MULTIPLE LOCATIONS AVAILABLE
FOOTBALL PITCH RENTAL FROM AED 400 ONLY!!
REGISTER NOW FOR THE HOLIDAY CAMP

Elite Sports Academy is the leading and most reputable Sports Academy in the UAE. Elite has earned a reputation for being the most recognisable and successful Sports Academy in Dubai for kids providing unrivalled development programmes & participation levels.

Since our foundation in 2012, over the past 10 years we have grown from our roots as a Football Academy in Dubai to becoming a fully fledged Sports Academy in the UAE. We offer a range of sports for including: Swimming Classes for Children & Multi Sports Coaching.

As a leading Kids Football Academy in Dubai and Abu Dhabi, we ensure that all our staff are highly trained and qualified, giving you peace of mind that your child/children are always in safe hands. So, if you are interested in Swimming Classes for Children in Dubai or just looking for a Football Academy in Dubai For Kids, or indoor sessions including Basketball and Gymnastics, then enquire, register or contact Elite Sports Academy Dubai.

div.h2: Here's What Our Customers are Saying

div.p: "Our three boys have been involved with Elite Sports for a number of years and really enjoy the football coaching and holiday camps. The coaches are really enthusiastic and my kids have insisted we us..."

a.data-text: Our three boys have been involved with Elite Sports for a number of years and really enjoy the football coaching and holiday camps. The coaches are really enthusiastic and my kids have insisted we use Elite Sports for their birthday parties. Great all round sports academy and would highly recommend.

div.p: "Amazing energetic academy! My son enjoys playing Football with Elite because its very competitive and offers a wide range of opportunities to improve and compete against other teams. Coaches are very..."

a.data-text: Amazing energetic academy! My son enjoys playing Football with Elite because its very competitive and offers a wide range of opportunities to improve and compete against other teams. Coaches are very professional with students and always positive. Highly recommended!!

div.p: "My boys started with Elite in November 2016. We have been very happy with Elite from the beginning. Their recreational sessions are a good starting point for every football player. My boys found their..."

a.data-text: My boys started with Elite in November 2016. We have been very happy with Elite from the beginning. Their recreational sessions are a good starting point for every football player. My boys found their passion in football and progressed from recreational football to development and then to their advanced squads. Both squads participate at Elites own bi-weekly league with various other clubs to compete with. Some of the boys are chosen to a select squads where they are sent to competitions across the country. They even offer a UK trip where they have a cooperation with the West Ham United foundation. During this the COVID19 times, they offer live session thrice a week, send videos from West Ham United Foundation across and offer various competitions both off and online.

div.p: "My 2 sons have been playing with Elite Sports Academy for 4 years now, and I cannot recommend the Academy enough. Starting in the football programme, both now play competitively in the football squads..."

a.data-text:
My 2 sons have been playing with Elite Sports Academy for 4 years now, and I cannot recommend the Academy enough. Starting in the football programme, both now play competitively in the football squads, have attended camps and traveled abroad on football tours. The favourite part of their week is training and their matches, and the coaching team have played a huge part in their development.
During the current lockdown, their live coaching sessions have kept them actively engaged and busy, combined with the educational homework and West Ham United activities over the weekend and their weekend quizzes.
Elite have been brilliant during the current time, really making the boys feel part of the team whilst unable to train with their friends and team mates.
THANK YOU SO MUCH ELITE!

div.p: "My son has been with Elite Sports Academy since Foundation Stage One in school (Age 4) He loved football but didnt understand the techniques but thanks to the coaches at Elite hes now playing in the..."

a.data-text: My son has been with Elite Sports Academy since Foundation Stage One in school (Age 4) He loved football but didnt understand the techniques but thanks to the coaches at Elite hes now playing in the Advance level at Elite and takes part in the tournaments that are held every week. He is now aged 7 and he is constantly looking forward to the days he has football.

a.h2: Limited Spaces Available & Registration Still Open as the Weather Cools Down!

div.p: TELL US HOW WE CAN HELP YOU?
CUSTOM ERROR MESSAGE

select.name: contact_media
select.option: How you want to be contacted

p.p: I have worked with Richard and Steven now for 7 years in 2 of the schools I have worked in.
They both are very positive and dynamic with the range of opportunities they have offered and provided for my students over the years.

They are flexible and personable regarding all aspects of the admin side of the business and always deliver on promises and agreements made in informal chats or official meetings. They have worked around our school demands at all times after discussing our specific needs and always deliver high quality and professional service to the students with high levels of discipline and expectation within their training sessions. The fully qualified coaches they employ run sessions that are up to date and engaging for all students and provide ample opportunities for personal improvement in technical skills, understanding and teamwork. An extremely well-run company from top to bottom.

div.p: Primary PE Department

p.p: Elite Sports Academy have been running Football coaching courses at Regent for the past six years and Sunmarke since we opened. Elite also launched Holiday Camps in December of 2016 at both Regent and Sunmarke as well as Swimming at Regent in 2017. Elite are an extremely well organised and structured company, and I have only ever received positive feedback regarding their courses from the parents at our schools. One of the major reasons why we have partnered with Elite over the years is that they have all the correct credentials that a school requires for a professional organisation to run after school activities, which gives both the school and the parents peace of mind. Elite also simplify the payment and registration process by taking it out of the schools hands. The fact they take debit/credit card payments and online payments takes away all responsibility and workload away from the School.

div.h4: Fortes Education (Regent International and Sunmarke Schools)
div.p: Activities Manager

p.p: Universal American School brought Elite Sports Academy to our campus at the beginning of the 2018-2019 school year. Since then they have provided after school activities for our Elementary students, coaching support for our Grade 4, 5, and 6, and ran holiday sports camps during the winter, spring and summer months. Elite has been a pleasure to work with as they are extremely professional and extremely organized. They are very flexible and are able to meet the needs of the school in every way. We have had very positive feedback from parents regarding their academy and we have seen our after school activities numbers grow over the past two years since they have come on board.

div.p: Athletic Director

div.p: REGISTER NOW FOR THE NEW 2023/2024 SEASON WITH ELITE SPORTS ACADEMY.
Available for children aged 3 17 years of age, all NEW players can avail a FREE TRIAL SESSION in any of our Football, Swimming, Gymnastics & Basketball sessions across Dubai and Abu Dhabi.
Sessions commence from Wednesday 30th August 2023, and we cannot wait to welcome you to the academy.
